alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nassau and southeastern Camden Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Marys, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kings Bay Base, Dungeness and Cumberland Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
